english.segment1: So this is the time when. You be what you just wanna be. I always thought this would. Come oh so naturally
english.segment2: I'm gonna do just what you order me to do. So chase me chase me, I'll run twelve circles around you
english.segment3: I'll make this way worse than you know
english.segment4: Ain't it a shame that they won't remember all of this
english.segment5: Lets get lets get it goin'. Make a mess way worse than you know. We'll beat this town black and blue. With my quick and easy flow
english.segment6: They will ask us where we came from. Where's the place that we blew in from. I wanna make then like us. I wanna make them worship us
english.segment7: It will make you feel like you're in love
english.segment8: Ain't it a shame that they won't remember all of this. We're all just fakin' out with someone. Who tells us what we should miss
english.segment9: More fake than you have ever been. More fake than you have ever.. Spin spin the truth gets a chance
english.segment10: Ain't it a shame that they won't remember all of this. We're all just fakin' out with someone. Who tells us what we should miss
english.segment11: Ain't it a shame that they won't remember all of this. We're all just fakin' out with someone. Who tells us what we should miss
english.segment12: Don't tell me what to miss. Don't tell me what..
